permissions: User must be an admin to update tags.
validation_notes: Requires tag ID argument. At least one updatable field must be provided (currently --name). Tag name must be present and is unique per tag category (case-insensitive). Tag category is create-only and cannot be changed after creation.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: If provided, must be present; uniqueness enforced within tag category (case-insensitive).
